name: Memora
description: A voice-powered journaling app built with a RAG retrieval system to gain insights from your journal entries.

name: MelonGB
description: MelonGB is a Gameboy (DMG) and Gameboy Color (CGB) Emulator written in Rust. Visit this project's repository for a link to the emulator demo!

name: Moodplay
description: An interactive web app made using React that plays music, which changes depending on your mood. Mood detection is done using a custom-trained emotion detection model that's served through a backend hosted on Vercel. The site offers an easy-to-use layout, along with a clean and minimalist look designed to keep users engaged.

name: ImNES
description: ImNES is NES emulator implemented in Rust. It includes a debugging UI made using ImGui for desktop. The desktop UI has various features such as inspect the CPU, PPU, and APU state, viewing cartridge details, and controlling each audio channel. You can also pause, stop, or restart the emulation, as well as adjust the game speed.

name: FreshTrack
description: FreshTrack leverages AI and community networks to seamlessly track, reduce, and share food, minimizing waste and promoting sustainability.

name: Disaster Response App
description: A PHP website for disaster relief coordination, including rescue tracking and managed volunteers and supplies at relief centers. Data is stored on a SQL database hosted on Oracle with query sanitization to prevent injection attacks. This project was built for CPSC 304, a relational database course. Big thanks to Andy Xie and Alex Yang!

name: Genshin Wish Simulator
description: This is an app that simulates the Gacha system called 'Wishing', from the popular game 'Genshin Impact'. Users will be able to 'wish' for their desired characters or weapons, explore various outcomes, and track their progress. This project was built for CPSC 210: Software Construction.

name: Spotify to Youtube
description: Converts your favourite playlists on Spotify into a YouTube playlist, with minimal setup! Uses Spotify's API to fetch the data of all songs in a Spotify playlist and queries each song using the YouTube API to find its YouTube counterpart.

name: Melon Discord Bot
description: Meet Melon, a fun and helpful discord bot for fellow members of your Discord server. Melon tries to increase your server's engagement with fun features like birthday annoucements, VC time rankings and GIF generation. Server metrics and user data are stored using MongoDB.

name: ASCII Animation Generator
description: A command-line script that plays any MP4 file as an ASCII animation in your CLI, with sound included! CLI Window is automatically resized to match aspect ratio and FPS is maintained for a smooth playback. a trend on the internet of shocasing remakes of the animation of Bad Apple!! Was inspired by an internet trend of animating the video, Bad Apple!! but on any medium you can think of.

name: HTTP Server in C
description: A lightweight HTTP server in C to serve static files via GET requests, using low-level sockets and file system calls. Automated builds with Makefile and containerized with Docker for easy deployment.
